[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [ViewBehaviorFactory](../fast-element.viewbehaviorfactory/index.html)

## ViewBehaviorFactory interface

A factory that can create a [ViewBehavior](../fast-element.viewbehavior/) associated with a particular location within a DOM fragment.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ViewBehaviorFactory 
```
